NAME: Name
HELP_CHANNEL_GROUP: This is used by iptv clients to categorize the channels. You can leave it as dizqueTV if you don't need this sort of classification.
HELP_PROGRAMMING_END: Programming will restart from the beginning
CONSECUTIVE_AMOUNT: Desired number of consecutive TV shows.
HELP_BLOCK_SHUFFLE: Alternates TV shows in blocks of episodes. You can pick the number of episodes per show in each block and if the order of shows in each block should be randomized. Movies are moved to the bottom.
HELP_RANDOM_SHUFFLE: Completely randomizes the order of programs.
HELP_CYCLIC_SHUFFLE: Like Random Shuffle, but tries to preserve the sequence of episodes for each TV show. If a TV show has multiple instances of its episodes, they are also cycled appropriately.
WARN_NO_CHANNEL: No channels found. Click the to create a channel.
WARN_NO_FILLER_SOURCES: No filler sources set. Click the to add filler lists.
WARN_NO_PROGRAMMING: There are no programs in the channel, use the button to add programs from your media library or use the Tools to add Flex time or a Channel Redirect
